content.text:
# Waroid languages

Waroid is a proposal by Granberry and Vescelius (2004) linking Warao of Venezuela with the extinct Macoris and Guanahatabey languages of the Greater Antilles.
Languages
Granberry and Vescelius (2004) propose the following internal structure for the proposed Waroid family.
* Waroid
** Warao
** Caribbean
*** Macoris (Macorix)
**** Upper Macoris
**** Lower Macoris
*** Guanahatabey
See also
*Pre-Arawakan languages of the Greater Antilles
References
